data.why:
A script that might be useful for Windows administrators. The
    script takes in a computer name and returns the operating system
    information by connecting to registry (local or remotely) and
    retrieves the information.

    Here's an example of running the script: OSVer.pl Computer1

    Output: COMPUTER1 is running Microsoft Windows 2000 Server (Build
    2195), Service Pack 2

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (LABITBOL; Lior P. Abitbol)
